definitions.definition: To produce musical or harmonious sounds with one’s voice.
definitions.example: "I really want to sing in the school choir," said Vera.

definitions.definition: To express audibly by means of a harmonious vocalization.
To make a small, shrill sound.
definitions.example: The air sings in passing through a crevice.

definitions.definition: To relate in verse; to celebrate in poetry.
To display fine qualities; to stand out as excellent.
definitions.example: The sauce really makes this lamb sing.

definitions.definition: To be capable of being sung; to produce a certain effect by being sung.

A Chinese wind instrument, a free-reed mouth organ consisting of 13 or more bamboo pipes of various lengths, which are fixed at their bases in a wind chest made from a dried gourd (or, more recently, wood or chrome-plated brass).
